content: i found a similar pattern on ravelry but the size is for infants to 6 months so i changed the hook size and gauge and make it for a 1-year-old i also modified the length of the sleeves the pattern on the neck and crochet technique this cardigan is very easy to make and it s done in one day enjoy **all dcs are worked on back loop only only 3dc-in-next st and 5dc-in-next-st are worked on both loops ** if you think my woodie bear button is cute please visit my shop at https //www etsy com/shop/cutiestuffs section_id=6770681
